dcterms:creator: T. N. Kipf
M. Welling
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network dataset where each node corresponds to a scientific publication, and the edges represent citation relationships between publications. Each publication is represented by a bag-of-words attribute vector.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: T. N. Kipf
M. Welling
dcterms:description: Citeseer is a citation network dataset similar to Cora, where nodes represent scientific publications and edges represent citation relationships. Each publication is represented by a bag-of-words attribute vector.
dcterms:title: Citeseer (Cite)

dcterms:creator: T. N. Kipf
M. Welling
dcterms:description: Pubmed is a citation network dataset where nodes correspond to scientific publications, and edges represent citation relationships. Each publication is represented by a bag-of-words attribute vector.
dcterms:title: Pubmed (Pub)

dcterms:creator: J. McAuley
C. Targett
Q. Shi
A. Van Den Hengel
dcterms:description: Amazon-Photo is a dataset derived from the Amazon co-purchase graph where nodes represent products and edges indicate that two products are frequently bought together. Each product review is represented by a bag-of-words attribute vector.
dcterms:title: Amazon-Photo (Photo)

dcterms:creator: J. McAuley
C. Targett
Q. Shi
A. Van Den Hengel
dcterms:description: Amazon-Computers is a dataset from the Amazon co-purchase graph where nodes represent products and edges indicate that two products are frequently bought together. Each product review is represented by a bag-of-words attribute vector.
dcterms:title: Amazon-Computers (Comp)
